main event: Several reported sightings of unidentified aerial objects and small humanoid creatures near the Brush Creek area of California in 1953.
interesting points: Miners observed a bright, metallic disc-shaped object that would come near them and then dart away, with the object being described as around 15-20 feet in diameter.
Miners claimed to have seen a small man, around 3-4 feet tall, wearing green clothing and who seemed to be operating or inspecting the objects.
The objects were reported to make bell-like chiming sounds and would hover, then rapidly accelerate and take off.
Local residents, including photographers, reportedly attempted to observe the objects but were unable to capture them on film.
Authorities investigated the incidents but were unable to conclusively determine the nature of the objects or creatures observed.
photographs: no, the reports do not indicate any successful photographs were taken
